generalDescription.objective: Reduce the size of the training set without losing precision or accuracy in order to a posterior classification
generalDescription.howWork: This algorithm is a modified version of the PNN. PNN and MCA shares the same idea, init resulting set with original set, and merge prototypes while classification accuracy does not decrease. MCA, uses a distance matrix by classes to merge prototypes of the same class, and avoid removing of nearest prototypes of different classes. That distance matrix is recomputed each time that it makes a merge. When one pass has produced no merge, algorithm ends.
